text: Further , we examined the turnover of IκBα in IΚKβ and ORF2 co - expressing cells since IκBα is the major inhibitor of NF - κB activity in unstimulated cells . By performing a pulse chase assay , using [ 35 S ] - cys / met labeling mix , the half - life of IκBα in IKKβ expressing cells was found to be approximately 90 minutes , whereas in cells expressing both IKKβ and ORF2 , approximately 15 % of Heterologous expression of ORF2 protein inhibits NF - κB activity . ( A ) Huh7 cells were cotransfected in duplicate with NF - κB CAT reporter and pSGI vector or pSGI - ORF2 expression plasmid . 48 hour post transfection , cells were treated with 100 ng / ml TPA for 30 minutes and CAT activity was assayed . Spot intensity was quantified using NIH Image program and percentage CAT activity was calculated assuming the highest value as 100 % .
